name: Night Shift Schedule
title: Night Shift Schedule
description: Tailored to your health goals and preferences

meals.description: High-protein meal to fuel your night shift
instructions: Season steak with salt and pepper
Heat pan over medium-high heat with 10g butter
Cook steak 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare
Remove steak and rest for 5 minutes
In same pan, add spinach and cook until wilted
meals.goal_alignment: High protein and fat for sustained energy during night shift, minimal carbs for ketosis

meals.description: Quick energizing meal for your 2am break
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces
Whisk olive oil with lemon juice and salt
Top with chicken and grated parmesan
meals.goal_alignment: Moderate portion for sustained energy without heaviness during work hours

meals.description: Light meal with omega-3s to promote better sleep
instructions: Brush salmon with 5ml olive oil, season with salt
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky
Dice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes
Toss vegetables with remaining olive oil
Serve salmon over vegetables, top with almonds
meals.goal_alignment: Light, omega-3 rich meal that promotes sleep quality after night shift

days.day_notes: Meals timed for night shift schedule: energizing breakfast at 6pm, moderate lunch at 2am, light dinner at 10am to promote sleep

variety_score: Good variety across protein sources (beef, chicken, salmon) and cooking methods (pan-fried, no-cook, baked) within low-carb constraints
goal_alignment: Perfectly calibrated for night shift workers with high-energy meals before and during work, sleep-promoting lighter meal afterward. Maintains strict low-carb macros for weight loss while ensuring adequate protein for satiety.
shopping_tips: Buy pre-cooked chicken breast to save time during breaks. Prep vegetables in advance and store in containers. Keep shelf-stable items like nuts and canned salmon as backup options for busy nights.
